original:
Wait, you found Hiroyuki, too?

And around the same time, I 
ended up disappearing?!
Whoa... I don't remember any of 
that...
translation:
Wait, you found Hiroyuki, too?

And around the same time, I 
ended up disappearing?!
Whoa... I don't remember any of 
that...

original:
Huh...? Yui? I don't really 
remember seeing her, but...
Give me a moment, I'll try and 
think back...
translation:
Huh...? Yui? I don't really 
remember seeing her, but...
Give me a moment, I'll try and 
think back...

original:
I'm sorry, I really can't remember
anything...
Are you looking for Yui and Takuto
right now, ^P?
translation:
I'm sorry, I really can't remember
anything...
Are you looking for Yui and Takuto
right now, ^P?

original:
Alright, then I'm sorry but I think 
I'll head back to the DigiBase.
My head's been all messed up since
I woke up.
How do I go about returning to the
DigiBase from here, though...?
translation:
Alright, then I'm sorry but I think 
I'll head back to the DigiBase.
My head's been all messed up since
I woke up.
How do I go about returning to the
DigiBase from here, though...?

original: Oho?!
translation: Oho?!

original:
Both the new and former Local
Champions are leaving??
Then does that make us the
temporary Champions?!
translation:
Both the new and former Local
Champions are leaving??
Then does that make us the
temporary Champions?!

original:
Are you really alright with handing
the Champion title over to us?
translation:
Are you really alright with handing
the Champion title over to us?

original:
You're saying all this but...

I don't really understand any of it,
so just do what you think is best?
translation:
You're saying all this but...

I don't really understand any of it,
so just do what you think is best?

original:
Uhyooo! How lucky!
Uhyohyohyohyo...!
What do you think, Little Devi?!
We really did it, didn't we?!
Didn't I tell you I'd show you what
it's like to be at the top someday?!
You'd better thank me for this!
translation:
Uhyooo! How lucky!
Uhyohyohyohyo...!
What do you think, Little Devi?!
We really did it, didn't we?!
Didn't I tell you I'd show you what
it's like to be at the top someday?!
You'd better thank me for this!

original:
Pfffhahahahaha...!
As if, we're not even half way!
Besides, you barely did any
of the work!
translation:
Pfffhahahahaha...!
As if, we're not even half way!
Besides, you barely did any
of the work!

original:
See you, Little Devi...
You'll be alright now, won't you...?
translation:
See you, Little Devi...
You'll be alright now, won't you...?

original:
Yeah, I'll be fine, I've got nothing
to worry about now.
And I have you to thank for that.

It's... really great that you're 
back.
translation:
Yeah, I'll be fine, I've got nothing
to worry about now.
And I have you to thank for that.

It's... really great that you're 
back.

original:
..thank you.

Don't let that Tamer of yours get
away again, you got that?
translation:
..thank you.

Don't let that Tamer of yours get
away again, you got that?

original:
Alright, I guess we should get 
going, ^P.
translation:
Alright, I guess we should get 
going, ^P.

original: What is it...?
translation: What is it...?

original:
If you're really leaving, then we'll
give you this Gate Disk.
If you use that, you'll instantly be
taken back to the DigiBase.
translation:
If you're really leaving, then we'll
give you this Gate Disk.
If you use that, you'll instantly be
taken back to the DigiBase.

original:
That'd be great...

You'll be alright now, won't you...?
translation:
That'd be great...

You'll be alright now, won't you...?

original:
Yeah, I'll be fine, I've got nothing
to worry about now.
And I have you to thank for that.

I'm honestly so grateful that 
you're finally back to yourself.
translation:
Yeah, I'll be fine, I've got nothing
to worry about now.
And I have you to thank for that.

I'm honestly so grateful that 
you're finally back to yourself.

original:
...Thank you.

Don't let that Tamer of yours get
away again, you got that?
translation:
...Thank you.

Don't let that Tamer of yours get
away again, you got that?

original:
Stop that, you're giving me the 
creeps... it's not like I care...
………
………
Yeah, I know, Asuka.
I won't let him leave my sight.
translation:
Stop that, you're giving me the 
creeps... it's not like I care...
………
………
Yeah, I know, Asuka.
I won't let him leave my sight.

original:
Alright, ^P.

Sorry, but I'll be leaving ahead of
you, ok?
translation:
Alright, ^P.

Sorry, but I'll be leaving ahead of
you, ok?

original:
I really owe you a lot, huh? Then, if
you want to head to South City...
There are two gates you can leave
this city from,
The one you want to leave from is
the one with the Gate Tamer,
Because Task Port South's 
DigiPort is located in that direction.
Just head around the bend and 
you'll reach Graphics Board South.
translation:
I really owe you a lot, huh? Then, if
you want to head to South City...
There are two gates you can leave
this city from,
The one you want to leave from is
the one with the Gate Tamer,
Because Task Port South's 
DigiPort is located in that direction.
Just head around the bend and 
you'll reach Graphics Board South.

original:
I'm so glad you're back safe, 
Asuka!
You're not hurt, are you?
translation:
I'm so glad you're back safe, 
Asuka!
You're not hurt, are you?

original:
I'm fine... my head's still a little
groggy, that's all.
That aside, who's this 'Kernel' 
guy everyone's talking about?
translation:
I'm fine... my head's still a little
groggy, that's all.
That aside, who's this 'Kernel' 
guy everyone's talking about?

original:
He's the leader of the Tamers 
gathered on Graphics Board.
Weren't you a part of the Tamers
that he gathered, Asuka?
translation:
He's the leader of the Tamers 
gathered on Graphics Board.
Weren't you a part of the Tamers
that he gathered, Asuka?

original:
I don't know...
I don't remember anything...
translation:
I don't know...
I don't remember anything...

original:
If we go to Graphics Board, I think
we'd be able to meet him...
Plus, it sounds like Yui and Takuto
are there, too...
Do you think we should go take a 
look?
translation:
If we go to Graphics Board, I think
we'd be able to meet him...
Plus, it sounds like Yui and Takuto
are there, too...
Do you think we should go take a 
look?

original: Absolutely not!
translation: Absolutely not!

original:
Why not?! Are you telling me NOT
to go look for those two??
translation:
Why not?! Are you telling me NOT
to go look for those two??

original:
Look, I know ^P
wouldn't stop you, but...
You'll just get in the way, Hiroyuki,
so you really shouldn't go!
Haven't you caused us enough
trouble as it is?!
translation:
Look, I know ^P
wouldn't stop you, but...
You'll just get in the way, Hiroyuki,
so you really shouldn't go!
Haven't you caused us enough
trouble as it is?!

original:
Not only that, after doing some
investigating on Kernel...
We've found that he's not a normal
human being.
translation:
Not only that, after doing some
investigating on Kernel...
We've found that he's not a normal
human being.

original: I knew that much...
translation: I knew that much...

original:
It's nothing to do with his odd
personality.
It appears Kernel was a legendary
person in the past...
And that, together with his friends,
he created the Digital World.
translation:
It's nothing to do with his odd
personality.
It appears Kernel was a legendary
person in the past...
And that, together with his friends,
he created the Digital World.

original: In the past...?
translation: In the past...?

original:
Yes, an extremely long time ago.

It seems he is no longer alive in
the real world.
translation:
Yes, an extremely long time ago.

It seems he is no longer alive in
the real world.

original: You're saying he's... a ghost?!
translation: You're saying he's... a ghost?!

original:
Not exactly, I believe that what
we've seen is simply an avatar.
In other words, a copy of himself
left in the form of digital data.
We'll continue to investigate more
into the situation...
We'd like to ask Asuka and Hiroyuki
to help us out in that regard.
So could you go search for Yui and
Takuto, ^P?
translation:
Not exactly, I believe that what
we've seen is simply an avatar.
In other words, a copy of himself
left in the form of digital data.
We'll continue to investigate more
into the situation...
We'd like to ask Asuka and Hiroyuki
to help us out in that regard.
So could you go search for Yui and
Takuto, ^P?

original:
Stop right there, nume! Turn 
around and leave right away!
Anyone who's not Numemon is 
considered an enemy, nume!
translation:
Stop right there, nume! Turn 
around and leave right away!
Anyone who's not Numemon is 
considered an enemy, nume!

original: I warned you, nume!
translation: I warned you, nume!

original:
Nu-Nu-Nume! Remember this! 
This isn't the end, nume!
I won't give up until you leave
this place, nume!
translation:
Nu-Nu-Nume! Remember this! 
This isn't the end, nume!
I won't give up until you leave
this place, nume!

original:
Why did you purposely decide
to come here, nume?
Did you look at us and see us
as an easy win, nume?
translation:
Why did you purposely decide
to come here, nume?
Did you look at us and see us
as an easy win, nume?

original:
It's a little late to feign
ignorance, nume!
I'll take you up on that challenge!
translation:
It's a little late to feign
ignorance, nume!
I'll take you up on that challenge!

original:
In reality, it seems fighting isn't
as bad as I thought, nume.
Running away, hiding, cowering,
shivering, crying...
It was much scarier back when 
I was a coward, nume!
translation:
In reality, it seems fighting isn't
as bad as I thought, nume.
Running away, hiding, cowering,
shivering, crying...
It was much scarier back when 
I was a coward, nume!

original:
A-are you an enemy of the
Numemon, nume?
translation:
A-are you an enemy of the
Numemon, nume?

original:
We won't be fooled by your lies
so easily, nume!
I know the second we let our guard
down, you'll strike, nume!
translation:
We won't be fooled by your lies
so easily, nume!
I know the second we let our guard
down, you'll strike, nume!

original:
Team Numemon,
Assemble!
translation:
Team Numemon,
Assemble!

original:
What's wrong? Did something 
happen, nume?
translation:
What's wrong? Did something 
happen, nume?

original:
You called for us? What's up, 
nume?
translation:
You called for us? What's up, 
nume?

original:
Beating up the opposing enemy,
nume!
That is our - Team Numemon's -
duty, nume!
translation:
Beating up the opposing enemy,
nume!
That is our - Team Numemon's -
duty, nume!

original:
I-is what I want to say, b-but...
W-w-what should we do, nume?
translation:
I-is what I want to say, b-but...
W-w-what should we do, nume?

original:
Think about that before you bother
calling us out, nume!
translation:
Think about that before you bother
calling us out, nume!

original:
We've got no choice now but to
fight, nume!
translation:
We've got no choice now but to
fight, nume!

original:
T-t-t-t-that's right... We must
fight, nume! It's not scary, nume!
translation:
T-t-t-t-that's right... We must
fight, nume! It's not scary, nume!

original:
I'm not afraid, nume!

That's right, I'm not afraid, nume!
translation:
I'm not afraid, nume!

That's right, I'm not afraid, nume!

original: We won't lose, nume!
translation: We won't lose, nume!

original:
We'd never lose to the likes of you,
nume!
translation:
We'd never lose to the likes of you,
nume!

original: G...gah! What a disgrace, nume!
translation: G...gah! What a disgrace, nume!

original:
We can't lose to someone as 
insignificant as you, nume!
translation:
We can't lose to someone as 
insignificant as you, nume!

original:
The fight has only just begun, 
nume...
One of us has managed to get 
ahold of a super power-up serum!
translation:
The fight has only just begun, 
nume...
One of us has managed to get 
ahold of a super power-up serum!

original:
I wonder if you can figure out
which one of us has it, nume?!
translation:
I wonder if you can figure out
which one of us has it, nume?!

original:
No, of course you can't, nume.
Now you've let your guard down...
It's time for super-powered
Numemon to unleash its ultimate...
translation:
No, of course you can't, nume.
Now you've let your guard down...
It's time for super-powered
Numemon to unleash its ultimate...

original: Nume Nume Numeme♪
translation: Nume Nume Numeme♪

original: Y-you figured it out, nume?!
translation: Y-you figured it out, nume?!

original:
Oh no...! 
Retreat, nume!
translation:
Oh no...! 
Retreat, nume!

original:
Huh? What's wrong? Where are
you going, nume?
translation:
Huh? What's wrong? Where are
you going, nume?

original:
To purposefully select me out of all
the Numemon, nume...
Do you wanna get hurt that badly,
eh, nume?!
translation:
To purposefully select me out of all
the Numemon, nume...
Do you wanna get hurt that badly,
eh, nume?!

original:
As you wish! I'll defeat you with 
my most powerful technique, nume!
translation:
As you wish! I'll defeat you with 
my most powerful technique, nume!

original:
I was the one who got hurt, nume!
This isn't how it's supposed to go!
I won't forget this, nume!
translation:
I was the one who got hurt, nume!
This isn't how it's supposed to go!
I won't forget this, nume!

original:
There are both Numemon who fight
and those who don't, nume.
Do you know why that is, nume?
translation:
There are both Numemon who fight
and those who don't, nume.
Do you know why that is, nume?

original:
There probably isn't a difference.
I just zoned out for a bit, nume.
And now I've decided!

I'm gonna fight you, right here and 
now!
translation:
There probably isn't a difference.
I just zoned out for a bit, nume.
And now I've decided!

I'm gonna fight you, right here and 
now!

original:
That wasn't as scary or painful
as I expected, nume!
Remember this!
Next time we fight, nume...
I'll have become much stronger,
nume!
translation:
That wasn't as scary or painful
as I expected, nume!
Remember this!
Next time we fight, nume...
I'll have become much stronger,
nume!

original:
What's that?

You want to meet the Champion
of South City, nume?
translation:
What's that?

You want to meet the Champion
of South City, nume?

original:
You're not worthy of such a 
privilege, nume!
Open your eyes and get ahold 
of reality, nume!
translation:
You're not worthy of such a 
privilege, nume!
Open your eyes and get ahold 
of reality, nume!

original:
The only ones allowed to meet with
the Champion of this city, nume,
Are those who have been
acknowledged by our comrades,!
translation:
The only ones allowed to meet with
the Champion of this city, nume,
Are those who have been
acknowledged by our comrades,!

original:
Could you be...
^P, nume!?
Rumors have been spreading all
across town about you!
H-however, We cannot allow you to
pass through here, nume!
translation:
Could you be...
^P, nume!?
Rumors have been spreading all
across town about you!
H-however, We cannot allow you to
pass through here, nume!

original:
Just ahead of here is our 
Champion's room.
We cannot allow you to proceed
any further past this point, nume!
translation:
Just ahead of here is our 
Champion's room.
We cannot allow you to proceed
any further past this point, nume!

original:
We are the chosen elite of the
Numemon, nume!
No matter what you do, we 
mustn't allow you to pass, Nume!
translation:
We are the chosen elite of the
Numemon, nume!
No matter what you do, we 
mustn't allow you to pass, Nume!

original:
If you think we*re on the same level
as all those other Numemon...
...You're sorely mistaken, nume!
translation:
If you think we*re on the same level
as all those other Numemon...
...You're sorely mistaken, nume!

original:
Looks like we have no choice, we'll
open up the door for you, nume!
However, if you want to challenge
our Champion...
There are conditions, nume!
translation:
Looks like we have no choice, we'll
open up the door for you, nume!
However, if you want to challenge
our Champion...
There are conditions, nume!

original:
There's a mysterious Digimon in
Thriller Ruins called Ebemon, nume.
You must steal their treasured
"Ebe Pop" and bring it back!
You'll get the Ebe Pop by defeating
the Ebemon, nume.
translation:
There's a mysterious Digimon in
Thriller Ruins called Ebemon, nume.
You must steal their treasured
"Ebe Pop" and bring it back!
You'll get the Ebe Pop by defeating
the Ebemon, nume.

original:
You cannot meet the Champion,
nor will we acknowledge our defeat.
However if you want us to
acknowledge our defeat, nume...
Then be a good Tamer and go get
us some of that Ebe Pop, nume!
translation:
You cannot meet the Champion,
nor will we acknowledge our defeat.
However if you want us to
acknowledge our defeat, nume...
Then be a good Tamer and go get
us some of that Ebe Pop, nume!

original:
You'll find Ebemon near Thriller 
Port West, nume.
Nearby a clocktower, just continue 
from the city gate.
That pesky Guard Tamer should be
gone by now, nume!
translation:
You'll find Ebemon near Thriller 
Port West, nume.
Nearby a clocktower, just continue 
from the city gate.
That pesky Guard Tamer should be
gone by now, nume!

original:
If you understand, then hurry and
get going, nume!
translation:
If you understand, then hurry and
get going, nume!

original:
You're saying you forgot where to 
get the Ebe Pop, nume?!
Are you really taking this seriously, 
nume?!
translation:
You're saying you forgot where to 
get the Ebe Pop, nume?!
Are you really taking this seriously, 
nume?!

original:
So you are serious, its just your
memory isn't so good, nume...
Then fine, I guess thats how it is.

I'll tell you once more, so listen 
carefully this time, nume!
translation:
So you are serious, its just your
memory isn't so good, nume...
Then fine, I guess thats how it is.

I'll tell you once more, so listen 
carefully this time, nume!

original:
You'll find Ebemon near the West
Thriller Port.
Go there and seal the Ebe Pop
from them, nume!
They hang out around Thriller Port
West, nume!
Just go to the clock tower near the
city gates.
If you understand, then hurry and
get going, nume!
translation:
You'll find Ebemon near the West
Thriller Port.
Go there and seal the Ebe Pop
from them, nume!
They hang out around Thriller Port
West, nume!
Just go to the clock tower near the
city gates.
If you understand, then hurry and
get going, nume!

original:
Beep beep boop?
Beep boop!
Beep boop krsshhh!
translation:
Beep beep boop?
Beep boop!
Beep boop krsshhh!

original:
You must be a Selector! You've
come here to steal our treasure!
We won't allow you! We will teach
you for trying to steal from us,
is what we're saying!
translation:
You must be a Selector! You've
come here to steal our treasure!
We won't allow you! We will teach
you for trying to steal from us,
is what we're saying!

original:
Boop boop...
Beep beep boop...
translation:
Boop boop...
Beep beep boop...

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i

original:
We will give you the Ebe Pop.

Take it and leave us alone,
is what we're saying.
However...
translation:
We will give you the Ebe Pop.

Take it and leave us alone,
is what we're saying.
However...

original:
We shouldn't be saying this, but...
We will offer you this warning.
You will end up regretting this.
Are you sure you want to do this?
translation:
We shouldn't be saying this, but...
We will offer you this warning.
You will end up regretting this.
Are you sure you want to do this?

original:
Oh! I see you brought back the Ebe
Pop, nume!
Did those Ebemon get angry at 
you, nume?
translation:
Oh! I see you brought back the Ebe
Pop, nume!
Did those Ebemon get angry at 
you, nume?

original:
Well, I guess that's obvious, 
considering you took their treasure.
More importantly, hand that over
to us, nume.
translation:
Well, I guess that's obvious, 
considering you took their treasure.
More importantly, hand that over
to us, nume.

original: Hand over the Ebe Pop?
translation: Hand over the Ebe Pop?

original: As promised, hand it over.
translation: As promised, hand it over.

original: It'll go to waste, don't hand it over.
translation: It'll go to waste, don't hand it over.

original:
What? You won't hand it over? 
That's unfair, you promised, nume!
So you were trying to fool us?!
Just hand it over, nume!
translation:
What? You won't hand it over? 
That's unfair, you promised, nume!
So you were trying to fool us?!
Just hand it over, nume!

original:
This is the real deal, nume...
Now, we can use this...
translation:
This is the real deal, nume...
Now, we can use this...

original:
Numemon A
Excellent Combine, nume!
translation:
Numemon A
Excellent Combine, nume!

original:
Numemon B
Brilliant Combine, nume!
translation:
Numemon B
Brilliant Combine, nume!

original:
Numememememe...♪

Now you're nothing but small fry
compared to us, nume!
translation:
Numememememe...♪

Now you're nothing but small fry
compared to us, nume!

original:
We apologize for fooling you,
but a win is a win, nume!
There's no point in playing fair
if you're just gonna lose, nume!
translation:
We apologize for fooling you,
but a win is a win, nume!
There's no point in playing fair
if you're just gonna lose, nume!

original:
How strange, nume...

Despite becoming giant, we still
weren't strong enough, nume...
translation:
How strange, nume...

Despite becoming giant, we still
weren't strong enough, nume...

original:
In fact, despite becoming bigger,
it appears we only got weaker...
translation:
In fact, despite becoming bigger,
it appears we only got weaker...

original:
I guess at this stage, we have no
choice but to accept defeat, nume!
translation:
I guess at this stage, we have no
choice but to accept defeat, nume!

original:
To protect our Champion's image,
let me just say this, nume!
Everything we've done until now 
has been of our own will!
Our Champion has not ordered us
to do any of this, nume!
translation:
To protect our Champion's image,
let me just say this, nume!
Everything we've done until now 
has been of our own will!
Our Champion has not ordered us
to do any of this, nume!

original:
We just wanted to show them that
we're unbeatable, nume.
But I want to say that it's fine, 
now, you can pass through.
That's all, nume...
translation:
We just wanted to show them that
we're unbeatable, nume.
But I want to say that it's fine, 
now, you can pass through.
That's all, nume...

original: Hmph. So you've finally arrived.
translation: Hmph. So you've finally arrived.

original:
What's with that surprised look?
Considering the Numemon...
Wasn't it obvious that the Local 
Champion would be us Bandits?
translation:
What's with that surprised look?
Considering the Numemon...
Wasn't it obvious that the Local 
Champion would be us Bandits?

original:
Their battle style is always so
unsightly and clumsy.
It's just impossible to rely on those
guys.
translation:
Their battle style is always so
unsightly and clumsy.
It's just impossible to rely on those
guys.

original:
You're saying they tried their 
best...?
That's why I said it's so difficult
to watch.
Why bother trying to praise your
oppenents?
That truly is disgraceful.
translation:
You're saying they tried their 
best...?
That's why I said it's so difficult
to watch.
Why bother trying to praise your
oppenents?
That truly is disgraceful.

original:
You think we Bandits are on the
same level as those Digimon?
Then it's about time I open your
eyes...
And show you just how different
we are!
translation:
You think we Bandits are on the
same level as those Digimon?
Then it's about time I open your
eyes...
And show you just how different
we are!

original:
Ahhh, I lost...

I guess those Numemon really did
get stronger,
Since they were able to rile up a 
Tamer like you, after all.
So tell me, were they strong?
translation:
Ahhh, I lost...

I guess those Numemon really did
get stronger,
Since they were able to rile up a 
Tamer like you, after all.
So tell me, were they strong?

original:
Is that so? I'm glad...

Then I guess it'll be alright if we
leave them be.
translation:
Is that so? I'm glad...

Then I guess it'll be alright if we
leave them be.

original:
Sorry, but can you tell the
Numemon something for us?
We'll be leaving for a bit, so tell
them to protect this city well.
translation:
Sorry, but can you tell the
Numemon something for us?
We'll be leaving for a bit, so tell
them to protect this city well.

original:
Oh, I also need to give you this. 
It's the key to the next city.
translation:
Oh, I also need to give you this. 
It's the key to the next city.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i

original:
Hey there, where'd you come 
from?
translation:
Hey there, where'd you come 
from?

original:
You came from the Real World and
arrived at North Bridge?
That's quite rare... so you're a 
newbie Tamer, then?
You know, I used to also be a 
Tamer... a long time ago.
translation:
You came from the Real World and
arrived at North Bridge?
That's quite rare... so you're a 
newbie Tamer, then?
You know, I used to also be a 
Tamer... a long time ago.

original:
Though I probably can't call myself
a Tamer anymore...
Since I lost my Digivice after not 
paying attention to it for a while.
translation:
Though I probably can't call myself
a Tamer anymore...
Since I lost my Digivice after not 
paying attention to it for a while.

original:
It seems like my ex-Tamer still has
their Digivice, I think.
Though they don't appear to keep
any Digimon, anymore.
translation:
It seems like my ex-Tamer still has
their Digivice, I think.
Though they don't appear to keep
any Digimon, anymore.

original:
Could it be..? You're...

Hoping to become the World
Champion...?
translation:
Could it be..? You're...

Hoping to become the World
Champion...?

original:
Then that means you've come here
to fight the Local Champion, right?
translation:
Then that means you've come here
to fight the Local Champion, right?

original: Ahhh, that's unfortunate...
translation: Ahhh, that's unfortunate...

original:
It's complicated, but while he's
technically here, you can't see him...
translation:
It's complicated, but while he's
technically here, you can't see him...

original:
Well, you'll understand once you 
go there.
translation:
Well, you'll understand once you 
go there.

original: H-hey, wait a minute!
translation: H-hey, wait a minute!

original:
Could you please reconsider going
past here...?
I won't talk bad about you or 
anything, so...
Could you just go back to where 
you came from and relax...?
translation:
Could you please reconsider going
past here...?
I won't talk bad about you or 
anything, so...
Could you just go back to where 
you came from and relax...?

original:
No, please don't be like that...

If I let you pass, I'm gonna be the
one to get an earful!
I won't bother you, I'm not even 
picking a fight, so come on...
You don't want to get in trouble,
either now, do you...?
translation:
No, please don't be like that...

If I let you pass, I'm gonna be the
one to get an earful!
I won't bother you, I'm not even 
picking a fight, so come on...
You don't want to get in trouble,
either now, do you...?

original:
...Are you really determined to 
pass?
translation:
...Are you really determined to 
pass?

original:
Fine then...! 
If it's a fight you want,
then it's a fight you'll get!
It's too late for regrets now,
alright?!
translation:
Fine then...! 
If it's a fight you want,
then it's a fight you'll get!
It's too late for regrets now,
alright?!

original:
See, I lost! 
It's just as I expected!
Fine then, just pass already!
translation:
See, I lost! 
It's just as I expected!
Fine then, just pass already!

original:
I've had enough of you, just leave
me alone!
I really hate all this fighting and 
violence!
Just go already, go wherever you
want!
translation:
I've had enough of you, just leave
me alone!
I really hate all this fighting and 
violence!
Just go already, go wherever you
want!

original:
Oh no! No, no, no!
T-t-t-they're here! They're here!
translation:
Oh no! No, no, no!
T-t-t-they're here! They're here!

original:
If an outsider has made it this far,
then that must mean...
Lumor lost, right...?

Though knowing him, he probably
didn't put up a real fight.
translation:
If an outsider has made it this far,
then that must mean...
Lumor lost, right...?

Though knowing him, he probably
didn't put up a real fight.

original:
I'm warning you now, I'm on a 
different level to him.
Whether I'm afraid, whether I 
believe I can actually win...
That doesn't matter, what does
is that I'll put up my best defence.
After all, it's my duty to protect
this place!
translation:
I'm warning you now, I'm on a 
different level to him.
Whether I'm afraid, whether I 
believe I can actually win...
That doesn't matter, what does
is that I'll put up my best defence.
After all, it's my duty to protect
this place!

original:
Well, I lost. Then I guess I have
no choice.
I won't stop you from passing 
through here, but...
Just know that its locked from the
inside, you can't get in.
The Local Champion simply won't
come out of his room.
translation:
Well, I lost. Then I guess I have
no choice.
I won't stop you from passing 
through here, but...
Just know that its locked from the
inside, you can't get in.
The Local Champion simply won't
come out of his room.

original:
He used to be an incredible Tamer
not long ago.
However, one day he just decided
he'd stop fighting the Selectors.
And suddenly locked himself away
in that room.
I have no clue what caused it, but
maybe you can try figure it out?
translation:
He used to be an incredible Tamer
not long ago.
However, one day he just decided
he'd stop fighting the Selectors.
And suddenly locked himself away
in that room.
I have no clue what caused it, but
maybe you can try figure it out?

original:
Though even if you call out to him,
he won't even reply.
His name is... 
What was it again...
translation:
Though even if you call out to him,
he won't even reply.
His name is... 
What was it again...

original: His name is Flaar.
translation: His name is Flaar.

original: His name is Flaar.
translation: His name is Flaar.

original:
Though his friends just call 
him Ace.
translation:
Though his friends just call 
him Ace.

original:
Though his friends just call 
him Ace.
translation:
Though his friends just call 
him Ace.

original: And who are you...?
translation: And who are you...?

original:
I'm Shuu, I'm from Tamer Town,

It's a place on Motherboard
Continent. Nice to meet you.
translation:
I'm Shuu, I'm from Tamer Town,

It's a place on Motherboard
Continent. Nice to meet you.

original:
My name is Kizuna, and I'm from
a place called Tamer Town.
It's located on Motherboard
Continent. Nice to meet you.
translation:
My name is Kizuna, and I'm from
a place called Tamer Town.
It's located on Motherboard
Continent. Nice to meet you.

original:
Are you a friend of the Local 
Champion here?
translation:
Are you a friend of the Local 
Champion here?

original:
Kinda, though I'm glad I've finally
been able to find the guy.
Though I've had no luck trying to
coax him out of his room.
Ace is a bit of a eccentric and 
stubborn guy,
So I can only think of one person
who can persuade him to come out.
translation:
Kinda, though I'm glad I've finally
been able to find the guy.
Though I've had no luck trying to
coax him out of his room.
Ace is a bit of a eccentric and 
stubborn guy,
So I can only think of one person
who can persuade him to come out.

original:
Sort of, at least we've finally
managed to find him.
Unfortunately I've had no luck
trying to get him to come out.
Ace is a bit of a eccentric and 
stubborn guy,
So I'm sure there's only one
person that can solve this.
translation:
Sort of, at least we've finally
managed to find him.
Unfortunately I've had no luck
trying to get him to come out.
Ace is a bit of a eccentric and 
stubborn guy,
So I'm sure there's only one
person that can solve this.

original:
And that's gotta be his partner, 
BanchoLeomon.
It's the only one Ace trusts with
all of his being.
translation:
And that's gotta be his partner, 
BanchoLeomon.
It's the only one Ace trusts with
all of his being.

original:
And that's his partner,
BanchoLeomon.
It's the only one Ace trusts with
all of his heart.
translation:
And that's his partner,
BanchoLeomon.
It's the only one Ace trusts with
all of his heart.

original:
Hey, ^P, mind if I ask
you a favor?
Could you go find BanchoLeomon
for us?
I heard it's training somewhere
near Access Port North.
I'm not good with the cold, so I
really can't help here...
translation:
Hey, ^P, mind if I ask
you a favor?
Could you go find BanchoLeomon
for us?
I heard it's training somewhere
near Access Port North.
I'm not good with the cold, so I
really can't help here...

original:
Hey, ^P, may I ask
a favor of you?
Could you go find BanchoLeomon
for us?
Apparently it's training somewhere
near Access Port North.
I really dislike the cold, I can't 
handle it, so if you could...
translation:
Hey, ^P, may I ask
a favor of you?
Could you go find BanchoLeomon
for us?
Apparently it's training somewhere
near Access Port North.
I really dislike the cold, I can't 
handle it, so if you could...

original:
Please consider this a request from
me.
While I don't understand what's
happened with Ace...
We simply can't leave him like this...
translation:
Please consider this a request from
me.
While I don't understand what's
happened with Ace...
We simply can't leave him like this...

original:
Oh, ^P! Did you find
BanchoLeomon?
translation:
Oh, ^P! Did you find
BanchoLeomon?

original:
What's that? You haven't found 
them yet...?
No way! I heard they're training out
in Access Point North.
It's at the northern tip of the 
freezing Access Glacier.
I'm sure the fastest route
would be...
Leaving from the City Gate
closest to where we are now.
translation:
What's that? You haven't found 
them yet...?
No way! I heard they're training out
in Access Point North.
It's at the northern tip of the 
freezing Access Glacier.
I'm sure the fastest route
would be...
Leaving from the City Gate
closest to where we are now.

original:
What's that? You haven't found 
them yet...?
Well, I heard they're training out
in Access Point North.
It's at the northern tip of the 
freezing Access Glacier.
I believe the fastest route
would be...
If you go from the City Gate
closest to where we are now.
translation:
What's that? You haven't found 
them yet...?
Well, I heard they're training out
in Access Point North.
It's at the northern tip of the 
freezing Access Glacier.
I believe the fastest route
would be...
If you go from the City Gate
closest to where we are now.

original: More!!! I need to train MORE!!!
translation: More!!! I need to train MORE!!!

original: GRRRRAAAOOOOH!!!
translation: GRRRRAAAOOOOH!!!

original:
What did you say...?!

You want me to help you?!

Absolutely not!
I refuse to be bound to anyone else!
The only person I would ever be 
bound to is.................
translation:
What did you say...?!

You want me to help you?!

Absolutely not!
I refuse to be bound to anyone else!
The only person I would ever be 
bound to is.................

original:
Wait... why do I suddenly have a 
bad feeling about this..?
I feel someone, somewhere, needs
my help right now...
Could it be... you've come to ask
in place of... Ace...?
translation:
Wait... why do I suddenly have a 
bad feeling about this..?
I feel someone, somewhere, needs
my help right now...
Could it be... you've come to ask
in place of... Ace...?

original: YOU'VE GOTTA BE KIDDING ME!!!
translation: YOU'VE GOTTA BE KIDDING ME!!!

original:
As if anyone would ever listen to 
anything that coward says!
If you're siding with that guy, then
you're my enemy just like him!
translation:
As if anyone would ever listen to 
anything that coward says!
If you're siding with that guy, then
you're my enemy just like him!

original:
So... about Ace...
Where the hell has the fool gone?
He just up and left mid-fight
against the Selectors...
Where exactly did he run off and 
hide himself?
translation:
So... about Ace...
Where the hell has the fool gone?
He just up and left mid-fight
against the Selectors...
Where exactly did he run off and 
hide himself?

original:
He's shut himself away in the city
to put an end to the fighting?
What's that supposed to mean..?
translation:
He's shut himself away in the city
to put an end to the fighting?
What's that supposed to mean..?

original:
You don't get it either?

Then I guess we'll just have to ask
the guy directly. 
Ace is still in West City even now, 
right?!
translation:
You don't get it either?

Then I guess we'll just have to ask
the guy directly. 
Ace is still in West City even now, 
right?!

original:
Grrrrr, fine, I get it!
I'm heading over there myself!
translation:
Grrrrr, fine, I get it!
I'm heading over there myself!

original: GRRRRAAAOOOOH!!!
translation: GRRRRAAAOOOOH!!!

original:
Stop right there!

The Champion has not given me
permission to let you pass.
Anyone who tries to force their
way through will be eliminated.
Unfortunately for you, you've 
really ticked me off...
So I won't be holding back!
translation:
Stop right there!

The Champion has not given me
permission to let you pass.
Anyone who tries to force their
way through will be eliminated.
Unfortunately for you, you've 
really ticked me off...
So I won't be holding back!

original:
It seems BanchoLeomon came here
to try and open his partner's eyes.
And Ace has given BanchoLeomon 
permission to pass through.
If BanchoLeomon's able to help
Ace, we have no reason to stay.
Because my partner and I have 
been here protecting Ace,
Waiting for the right person to
arrive and awaken him.
translation:
It seems BanchoLeomon came here
to try and open his partner's eyes.
And Ace has given BanchoLeomon 
permission to pass through.
If BanchoLeomon's able to help
Ace, we have no reason to stay.
Because my partner and I have 
been here protecting Ace,
Waiting for the right person to
arrive and awaken him.

original:
Ace, I came all the way here from 
Tamer Town worried about you...
But why on earth would you turn
into a shut-in like this?
I thought you were fighting to help
save this world?
translation:
Ace, I came all the way here from 
Tamer Town worried about you...
But why on earth would you turn
into a shut-in like this?
I thought you were fighting to help
save this world?

original:
Ace, I came all the way here from 
Tamer Town worried about you...
But why on earth would you turn
into a shut-in like this?
I thought you were fighting to help
save this world?
translation:
Ace, I came all the way here from 
Tamer Town worried about you...
But why on earth would you turn
into a shut-in like this?
I thought you were fighting to help
save this world?

original:
It's been a very long time since
we parted ways...
But you must have fought your way
here, right?
I can't figure out whether you're 
motivated or a coward...
translation:
It's been a very long time since
we parted ways...
But you must have fought your way
here, right?
I can't figure out whether you're 
motivated or a coward...

original:
I did have determination.

Determination that I could stop the
fighing if I became Local Champion.
translation:
I did have determination.

Determination that I could stop the
fighing if I became Local Champion.

original:
Why do you need to stop the 
fighting?
By doing that, you're just 
squashing everyones potential.
The Tamers here... they're all
Tamers who have fought through 
East and South Cities, and who 
will only continue to grow.
translation:
Why do you need to stop the 
fighting?
By doing that, you're just 
squashing everyones potential.
The Tamers here... they're all
Tamers who have fought through 
East and South Cities, and who 
will only continue to grow.

original:
But why do you feel the need to 
stop the fighting?
By doing that, you're just 
surpressing everyones potential.
The Tamers here... they're all
Tamers who have fought through 
East and South Cities, and who 
will only continue to grow.
translation:
But why do you feel the need to 
stop the fighting?
By doing that, you're just 
surpressing everyones potential.
The Tamers here... they're all
Tamers who have fought through 
East and South Cities, and who 
will only continue to grow.

original:
Not a single Tamer comes out of a
fight with the Selectors unscathed.
If no one is able to defeat the
Local Champion, defeat me...
Then no one can continue to the 
next city.
That means no more fighting 
among ourselves, nor against
the Selectors...

...in other words, nobody has to 
get hurt anymore.
translation:
Not a single Tamer comes out of a
fight with the Selectors unscathed.
If no one is able to defeat the
Local Champion, defeat me...
Then no one can continue to the 
next city.
That means no more fighting 
among ourselves, nor against
the Selectors...

...in other words, nobody has to 
get hurt anymore.

original:
That's just your own cowardice 
talking!
Don't you dare go thinking everyone
agrees with what you're doing!
translation:
That's just your own cowardice 
talking!
Don't you dare go thinking everyone
agrees with what you're doing!

original:
As if I care! 
Just leave me alone!
I'm sick of it! Sick of losing
people I care about!
translation:
As if I care! 
Just leave me alone!
I'm sick of it! Sick of losing
people I care about!

original:
Words aren't gonna cut it here!
^P, summon your Digimon!
We're gonna teach this guy a 
lesson and open his eyes to reality!
And if he refuses to wake up...

Then we'll just have to put him into
an eternal sleep!
translation:
Words aren't gonna cut it here!
^P, summon your Digimon!
We're gonna teach this guy a 
lesson and open his eyes to reality!
And if he refuses to wake up...

Then we'll just have to put him into
an eternal sleep!

original:
It's too bad about that,
BanchoLeomon.
I no longer have a Digivice, nor any
Digimon partners.
translation:
It's too bad about that,
BanchoLeomon.
I no longer have a Digivice, nor any
Digimon partners.

original:
Yeah, that is too bad, Ace, since
it seems you're getting forgetful.
I've got your Digivice right here...

And your own Digimon is right in
front of your eyes! Are you blind?!
translation:
Yeah, that is too bad, Ace, since
it seems you're getting forgetful.
I've got your Digivice right here...

And your own Digimon is right in
front of your eyes! Are you blind?!

original:
Now come, ^P!
Fight me...
...no, fight US!
translation:
Now come, ^P!
Fight me...
...no, fight US!

original:
What on earth are you doing,
BanchoLeomon?!
A battle like this is pointless!
Don't you see?!
translation:
What on earth are you doing,
BanchoLeomon?!
A battle like this is pointless!
Don't you see?!

original:
So you finally get it.
You're right, there IS no meaning.
We don't NEED a reason.

We Digimon fight because we
want to.
We can't live without it. 
Don't you feel the same way...?
translation:
So you finally get it.
You're right, there IS no meaning.
We don't NEED a reason.

We Digimon fight because we
want to.
We can't live without it. 
Don't you feel the same way...?

original:
It doesn't MATTER how I feel 
about it!
If you continue like this, you'll have
to fight the Selectors, you know?!
There's no way you can beat them
with such pathetic tactics!
If you're too weak, they'll crush
you in an instant!
translation:
It doesn't MATTER how I feel 
about it!
If you continue like this, you'll have
to fight the Selectors, you know?!
There's no way you can beat them
with such pathetic tactics!
If you're too weak, they'll crush
you in an instant!

original:
If you don't want to lose anyone,
you need to get stronger, right?!
Whether its you or me or anyone
else...
Don't go taking the easy way out 
and blaming the weak!
This isn't about anyone else here, 
only you!
You need to decide NOW, Ace!
Will you join me against the 
Selectors again, or get left behind
with that dumb look on your face?!
If you choose the latter, I've got 
a replacement lined up right here!
translation:
If you don't want to lose anyone,
you need to get stronger, right?!
Whether its you or me or anyone
else...
Don't go taking the easy way out 
and blaming the weak!
This isn't about anyone else here, 
only you!
You need to decide NOW, Ace!
Will you join me against the 
Selectors again, or get left behind
with that dumb look on your face?!
If you choose the latter, I've got 
a replacement lined up right here!

original:
Ahaha, guess it can't be helped...
If it comes to that, I'll do it.
What will you do, Ace? If you're
scared, I can take your place.
translation:
Ahaha, guess it can't be helped...
If it comes to that, I'll do it.
What will you do, Ace? If you're
scared, I can take your place.

original:
Ahaha, so that's how it is...
Then you can count on me♪
What will you do, Ace? I can take
your place if you're scared?
translation:
Ahaha, so that's how it is...
Then you can count on me♪
What will you do, Ace? I can take
your place if you're scared?

original:
...Okay, okay. I'll do it. 
I'll go wherever, do whatever. 
Whether it's against the Selectors
or anyone else, as long as
BanchoLeomon is with me...
translation:
...Okay, okay. I'll do it. 
I'll go wherever, do whatever. 
Whether it's against the Selectors
or anyone else, as long as
BanchoLeomon is with me...

original:
That's right, there's nothing to 
worry about. But don't forget...
It's not me being by your side,
it's us working TOGETHER!
translation:
That's right, there's nothing to 
worry about. But don't forget...
It's not me being by your side,
it's us working TOGETHER!

original:
Yeah... I remember now...
We were always like that, right?
Always a team... together.
translation:
Yeah... I remember now...
We were always like that, right?
Always a team... together.

original:
Farewell, ^P. You're 
heading out too, right?
If all goes well, the next place we'll
meet is the Colosseum.
translation:
Farewell, ^P. You're 
heading out too, right?
If all goes well, the next place we'll
meet is the Colosseum.

original:
Good luck, Ace. I'll be waiting
for you at the Colosseum too.
Though... probably as part of the
audience this time.
translation:
Good luck, Ace. I'll be waiting
for you at the Colosseum too.
Though... probably as part of the
audience this time.

original:
Good luck, Ace! I'll wait for you at
the Colosseum, too!
But... I'll probably be waiting in the
audience, this time.
translation:
Good luck, Ace! I'll wait for you at
the Colosseum, too!
But... I'll probably be waiting in the
audience, this time.

original:
I'll work hard and become as 
strong as I can.
^P, you really helped me
out today. I owe you one. 
Here, take the key to the next city.
translation:
I'll work hard and become as 
strong as I can.
^P, you really helped me
out today. I owe you one. 
Here, take the key to the next city.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i

original:
Later, ^P!
See you at the Colosseum.
translation:
Later, ^P!
See you at the Colosseum.

original:
Don't you dare go losing to any
small fry along the way, you hear?!
translation:
Don't you dare go losing to any
small fry along the way, you hear?!
